actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 1331 and 1332 of title 28, United States Code, to raise the amount in controversy required to establish Federal jurisdiction.

summary.text: Increases the amount in controversy required to establish jurisdiction in Federal courts from $10,000 to $25,000. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 1331, 1332)

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 1331 and 1332 of title 28, United States Code, to raise the amount in controversy required to establish Federal jurisdiction.
